title: Only lose 2 games in a row on 0 point... get demoted. Thank you Riot.

replies.body:
The whole "Three game grace period on 0 LP" is a myth. I've been saying this for ages.

It goes by MMR and MMR only, if your MMR is below the rank you are in, you will drop easier.

If your MMR is MUCH higher than your rank, you could lose 10 games on 0 LP and not drop.

^ pretty much.
The grace period is only applicable for those moving up tiers (e.g bronze to silver). 
Although... I think there is a tiny little grace period for those who have just moved up divisions, but only if their MMR is high enough.
The 0Lp protection is only provided for newly promoted players, for example Silver IV -> Silver III. Going Silver III -> Silver IV means you weren't quite ready.

you have to lose games to get to 0 LP first...count those. especially if its more than 2 in a row to get there...

but really, dropping means you obv didnt belong.
